actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House regarding the failure of the Government to curb its own energy use.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) the Government has failed to comply with the Energy Policy and Conservation Act of 1975; (2) the Government should reduce its gasoline consumption by 15 percent in 1980 and its energy consumption by 20 percent by 1985; and (3) the President should adopt the recommendations in the General Accounting Office report of December 12, 1979, to implement a comprehensive Federal energy management plan.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House regarding the failure of the Government to curb its own energy use.
